00026 typedef std::vector<int> DecIdContainer;
00027 typedef std::vector<std::string> StringIdContainer;
00028 typedef std::vector<Core::Identifier> CoreIdContainer;
00029 typedef std::map<int, std::string> GroupKeyToStringContainer;
00030 typedef boost::iterator_range<char*> IteratorRangeCharPointer;
00031 
00032 GroupKeyToStringContainer::value_type::second_type piGroupKeyToString(Core::Identifier identifier, GroupKeyToStringContainer container)
00033 {
00034         GroupKeyToStringContainer::iterator it = container.find(identifier.getGroupKey().getInternal());
00035         if(it != container.end())
00036         {
00037                 return it->second;
00038         }
00039         else
00040         {
00041                 return "Unknown";
00042         }
00043 }
00044 
00045 const char* getComponentName(const Core::Identifier::ComponentKey compKey)
00046 {
00047         unsigned short compNum = compKey.getInternal() >> 2;
00048         switch(compNum)
00049         {
00050                 case 1:
00051             return "S16_Core";
00052                 case 0x0a:   
00053                         return "S16_LungCommon";
00054                 case Bridge::BridgeDefinitions::BRIDGE_ID:
00055                         return "S16_BRG";
00056                 case 0x06:
00057                         return "S16_MIB";       
00058                 case 0x0f:
00059                         return "S30_Module"; 
00060                 case 0x09:
00061                         return "S16_Test";
00062                 case 0x02:
00063                         return "S16_ExtendedCore";
00064                 case 0x170:
00065                         return "S17onM16";
00066                 case 0x171:
00067                         return "S17onM16";
00068                 case 0x172:
00069                         return "S17onM16";
00070                 case 0x190:
00071                         return "S19onM16";
00072                 case 0x013:
00073                         return "M1V3";
00074                 case 0x041:
00075                         return "M4V1";
00076                 case 0x121:
00077                          return "M12.1";
00078                 case 0x124:
00079                         return "M12.4";
00080                 case 0x301:
00081                 case 0x300:
00082                          return "PrsOnM16";
00083                 case 0x151:
00084                         return "M15V1";
00085                 case 0x152:
00086                         return "M15V2";
00087                 case 0x210:
00088                         return "M21";
00089                 case 0x220:
00090                         return "S22";
00091                 default:
00092                         return "Unknown";
00093         }
00094 }

00096 void printDecIdContainerAsCoreId(DecIdContainer& decIds, GroupKeyToStringContainer& piGroupKeyToStringEntries)
00097 {
00098         try
00099         {
00100                 CoreIdContainer coreIds;
00101                 std::transform
00102                         (
00103                                 decIds.begin(),
00104                                 decIds.end(),
00105                                 coreIds.begin(),
00106                                 std::back_inserter(coreIds),
00107                                 boost::lambda::bind
00108                                 (
00109                                         boost::lambda::constructor<Core::Identifier>(),
00110                                         boost::lambda::_1
00111                                 )
00112                         );
00113 
00114                 char buf[1024];
00115                 std::for_each
00116                         (
00117                                 coreIds.begin(),
00118                                 coreIds.end(),
00119                                 (
00120                                         std::cout
00121                                         << boost::lambda::constant("Component: ")
00122                                         << boost::lambda::var(std::dec)
00123                                         << boost::lambda::bind
00124                                         (
00125                                                 &getComponentName,
00126                                                 boost::lambda::bind
00127                                                 (
00128                                                         &Core::Identifier::getComponentKey,
00129                                                         boost::lambda::_1
00130                                                 )                                               
00131                                         )
00132                                         << boost::lambda::constant(" Pi GroupKey: ")
00133                                         << boost::lambda::bind
00134                                         (
00135                                                 &piGroupKeyToString,
00136                                                 boost::lambda::_1,
00137                                                 boost::lambda::constant(piGroupKeyToStringEntries)
00138                                         )
00139                                         << '\n'
00140                                         << boost::lambda::constant("dec: ")
00141                                         << boost::lambda::var(std::dec)
00142                                         << boost::lambda::bind
00143                                         (
00144                                                 &Core::Identifier::getInternal,
00145                                                 boost::lambda::_1
00146                                         )
00147                                         << "\thex: "
00148                                         << std::hex
00149                                         << boost::lambda::bind
00150                                         (
00151                                                 &Core::Identifier::getInternal,
00152                                                 boost::lambda::_1
00153                                         )
00154                                         << "\tstring: "
00155                                         << boost::lambda::bind
00156                                         (
00157                                                 &Core::Identifier::toString,
00158                                                 boost::lambda::_1,
00159                                                 static_cast<char*>(buf),
00160                                                 sizeof(buf)
00161                                         )
00162                                         << '\n'
00163                                 )
00164                         );
00165         }
00166         catch(...)
00167         {
00168                 std::cout << "Unknow Identifier" << std::endl;
00169         }
00170 }

00172 void fillGroupKeyToStringContainer(GroupKeyToStringContainer& container)
00173 {
00174         boost::filesystem::path piBlackBoardGroupKeyEnumPath =
00175                 boost::filesystem::complete(
00176                         boost::filesystem::path(
00177                                 "X:\\perseus\\BabylogC_sw\\BabylogC\\base\\Descriptors\\BabylogTherapyUnitProperties.h",
00178                                 boost::filesystem::native));
00179         boost::filesystem::ifstream in(piBlackBoardGroupKeyEnumPath);
00180         char text[128];
00181         IteratorRangeCharPointer endOfEnumFinder;
00182         int enumCounter = 1;
00183 
00184         do
00185         {
00186                 in.getline(text, sizeof(text));
00187                 if(!(boost::algorithm::find_first(text, ",").empty()))
00188                 {
00189                         std::string str(text);
00190                         boost::algorithm::trim(str);
00191                         
00192                         boost::regex re("(\\w+)");
00193                         boost::smatch m;
00194                         if(boost::regex_search(str, m, re))
00195                         {
00196                                 str.assign(m[1].first, m[1].second);
00197                                 container.insert(std::make_pair(enumCounter++, str));
00198                         }
00199                 }
00200                 endOfEnumFinder = boost::algorithm::find_first(text, "BabylogGroupKeys;");
00201         } while(endOfEnumFinder.empty());
00202 }

00204 int _tmain(int argc, _TCHAR* argv[])
00205 {
00206         const char optionHelp[] = "help";
00207         const char optionIdString[] = "id";
00208 
00209         boost::program_options::options_description desc("Optional options");
00210         desc.add_options()
00211                 (       
00212                         optionHelp,
00213                         "Produces this help message.\n"
00214                         "Will also be displayed if started without any options.\n"
00215                 )
00216                 (
00217                         "id,i",
00218                         boost::program_options::value<StringIdContainer>(),
00219                         "Identifier as hex with 0x and as dec without 0x at the beginning which will be converted to string.\n"
00220                         "Example: \tIdentifierToString.exe --id 0x12345678\n\n"
00221                         "Multiple identifiers are possible, too.\n"
00222                         "Example: \tIdentifierToString.exe --id 0x12345678 --id 87654321\n\n"
00223                         "As this option is optional the following will work, too.\n"
00224                         "Example: \tIdentifierToString.exe 12345678 0x12345678\n"
00225                 );
00226         
00227         boost::program_options::positional_options_description pd;
00228         pd.add(optionIdString, -1);
00229 
00230         boost::program_options::variables_map vm;
00231         boost::program_options::store(
00232                 boost::program_options::command_line_parser(argc, argv).options(desc).positional(pd).run(), vm);
00233         boost::program_options::notify(vm);    
00234 
00235         if(vm.count(optionIdString))
00236         {
00237                 GroupKeyToStringContainer container;
00238                 fillGroupKeyToStringContainer(container);
00239 
00240                 StringIdContainer stringIds = vm[optionIdString].as<StringIdContainer>();
00241                 DecIdContainer decIds;
00242                 std::transform
00243                         (
00244                                 stringIds.begin(),
00245                                 stringIds.end(),
00246                                 decIds.begin(),
00247                                 std::back_inserter(decIds),
00248                                 boost::bind
00249                                 (
00250                                         &strtol,
00251                                         boost::bind
00252                                         (
00253                                                 &std::string::c_str,
00254                                                 _1
00255                                         ),
00256                                         static_cast<char**>(NULL),
00257                                         0
00258                                 )
00259                         );
00260                 printDecIdContainerAsCoreId(decIds, container);
00261 
00262                 return 0;
00263         }
00264 
00265         if(vm.count(optionHelp))
00266         {
00267                 std::cout << desc << "\n";
00268         }
00269         else
00270         {
00271                 std::cout << desc << "\n";
00272         }
00273 
00274         return 0;
00275 }
